title:  {{title}}
site:   courseR::courseRsite

---

{{instructions}}

<div>
      
  <!-- Nav tabs -->
  <ul class="nav nav-tabs" role="tablist">
    <li role="presentation" class="active">
      <a href="#task" aria-controls="task" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Tasks</a>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
      <a href="#solution" aria-controls="solution" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Reference solution</a>
    </li>
  </ul>
  
  <!-- Tab panes -->
  <div class="tab-content">
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane active" id="task">
      {{task}}
    </div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="solution">
      {{solution}}
    </div>
  </div>

</div>
